snippet: Top-ranked Rafael Nadal is back in a clay-court final at the Madrid Open, where Kei Nishikori of Japan converted his 10th match point in a grueling victory over David Ferrer on Saturday.
abstract: Rafael Nadal defeats Roberto Bautista Agut to advance to men's final of Madrid Open; other tournament results noted.
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Rafael Nadal is back in a clay-court final at the Madrid Open, where Kei Nishikori of Japan converted his 10th match point in a grueling victory over David Ferrer on Saturday.
